/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a tree-lined road in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand tall on either side of the road, creating a natural corridor. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the tranquility of the scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, suggesting the proximity of urban life. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue sky.
